# llms.txt v0.1

ABOUT
- Title: Sorce-like Job Search App — Full Build Specification
- Owner: Your Team
- Updated: 2026-01-25
- Purpose: Single-file, LLM-ready build spec for implementing an iOS swipe-to-apply job search app with backend ingestion, matching, and automation agents.

PRIMARY
- /README.md
- /status.md
- /project_analysis.md

GUIDANCE
- Use tool-using agent pattern for Application Agent [umbrex.com].
- Keep LLM settings deterministic where possible and log provenance [llm.datasette.io].
- Ensure inputs are LLM-ready: clean, structured, minimal PII [scrape.do].
- Treat LLMs in pipelines as non-deterministic; validate and log [dataengineeringcentral.substack.com].

CHANGES FROM ORIGINAL PLAN
- **Job Sources:** Replaced Greenhouse and Lever APIs with 6 RSS feeds + 7 company career page scrapers
- **Ingestion System:** Added Kafka for real-time job processing
- **Resume Parsing:** Enhanced with spaCy NER for improved entity extraction
- **Matching System:** Fixed scoring consistency issues
- **Testing:** Comprehensive test coverage with 59 tests passing

JOB SOURCES CONFIGURATION
- RSS feeds: Indeed, LinkedIn, GitHub, Stack Overflow, WeWorkRemotely, RemoteOK
- Company scrapers: Airbnb, Uber, Stripe, Spotify, GitHub, Slack, Dropbox

LICENSE
- Internal use. Do not use to violate any site’s ToS.
